briefTitle: A Trial Comparing Sequential Addition of Insulin Aspart Versus Further Dose Increase With Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Previously Treated With Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide and Metformin and in Need of Further Intensification

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Completion (Visit 28) of NN9068-3952 with insulin degludec/liraglutide + metformin
* HbA1c (glycosylated haemoglobin) above or equal to 7 percent at Visit 27 of NN9068-3952 trial

Exclusion Criteria:

* Clinically significant diseases of the major organ systems
* Screening calcitonin above or equal to 50 ng/L

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in HbA1c (Glycosylated Haemoglobin)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in HbA1c after 26 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Body Weight
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in body weight after 26 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Treatment-emergent Confirmed Hypoglycaemic Episodes
outcomeMeasures.description: Treatment-emergent hypoglycaemic episodes: if the onset of the episode occurred on or after the first day of investigational medicinal product administration, and no later than 7 days after the last day on investigational medicinal product. Confirmed hypoglycaemia: subject unable to treat himself/herself and/or have a recorded plasma glucose \< 3.1 mmol/L (56 mg/dL).
